Module kivakit.core
Package com.telenav.kivakit.core.thread

Class Batcher.BatchAdder

java.lang.Object
com.telenav.kivakit.core.thread.Batcher.BatchAdder
All Implemented Interfaces:
Addable<Value>, Emptiness, Joinable<Value>, Sequence<Value>, Sized, SpaceLimited, Iterable<Value>
Enclosing class:
Batcher<Value>
public class Batcher.BatchAdder extends Object implements Addable<Value>, Sequence<Value>
Adds elements to a batch and enqueues the batch when it is full before starting a new one. Note that this design is better than adding to a single batch in the Batcher because that batch data structure would have to be shared among threads, and therefore it would have to be synchronized. Having each thread add elements to its own thread-local batch adder reduces lock contention.
